idea:
Pushlytics offers a smarter way to build digital products. With comprehensive data collection and structured processes, Pushlytics helps Companies understand their users, make data-driven decisions, and craft delightful digital experiences.


Every growing business is trying to predict the future: What products should we build? Which markets should we enter? How do we provide great customer service?

These predictions require that businesses understand their ground truth: customers. Yet as businesses grow in size and complexity, customer understanding can get lost in internal politics and ego.

We’ve built infrastructure to automatically capture customer interactions, make sense of them, and make them actionable for anyone. We want to enable everyone to understand their millionth customer as well as they understood their first.
name: PUSHLYTICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Website


Our startup aims to solve one of the most critical issues today the world as a whole

faces.We manufacture 100% eco-friendly and biodegradable alternatives to single

use plastic like Paper straws , Disposable Wooden Cutlery. The Government is

strongly advocating the ban of single use plastic across the country due to its impact

on our environment and our biodiversity. Single-use plastics slowly and gradually

break down into smaller pieces of plastic and can take thousands of years for

plastic bags to decompose, thus contaminating our soil and water in the

process.Every plastic straw produced can take up to 200 years to decompose.Paper

Straws and Wooden Cutlery are not only 100% biodegradable and safe to use and

most importantly and help reduce the damage that single use plastic products

create. As an organisation we are able to reduce plastic consumption by around

900kgs per day and work continuously to increase that number with every passing

day. We are strongly advocating the ban of single use plastic.
name: BIOPAPRO PRIVATE LIMITED
